message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to be flexible, but $10,000 is below its true value. Could you consider $11,750? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on your investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for this product. I would like to propose $9,500 as my final offer.
